article.title: Intevac Research to Improve Night Vision Cameras
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Intevac Photonics Incorporated, Santa Clara, California, is being awarded a more than $9 million contract for research and development that will improve and characterize the performance of the ISIE4000 electron bombarded active pixel sensor night vision camera in support of various Navy aircraft platforms.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
